title: Pretensent
text:
Someday seems miles away
Someday, stuck in my head the whole way

But I won’t say anything
I won’t say anything
I won’t say someday
’Til someday is today

Someday, what a strange thing to say
Someday, what a beautiful day

But I won’t say anything
I won’t say anything
I won’t say someday
’Til someday is today
